scripts.format: npm run build && eslint -f unix --fix . && prettier "./**/*{.ts,.js,.json,.md,.yml,rc}" --write
scripts.lint: npm run build && eslint -f unix . && prettier "./**/*{.ts,.js,.json,.md,.yml,rc}" --check --log-level=warn
scripts.release: npm run build && changeset publish && npm run -ws --if-present release
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run -ws --if-present test
scripts.test:server: npm run build -w @marko/language-tools -w @marko/language-server && npm run test -w @marko/language-server -- --update
